name: Image-to-Text-OCR
description: Image to Text is a web tool to extract text from any image using OCR
readme_summary: Image to Text OCR is a web-based utility that allows users to extract text from any image using Optical Character Recognition (OCR). It provides a simple interface for converting visual text into editable digital text, ideal for digitizing documents or information captured in photos.
key_features: Extract text from any image using OCR
Web-based utility
Developed using Vue, Nuxt, and Vite
primary_use_case: Digitizing text from images for easy editing and use.
cover_image_prompt: A magical quill pen hovering over a photograph of a handwritten letter. The quill is actively transcribing the handwritten text from the photo onto a glowing, digital scroll that unfurls beside it. The photograph is visibly dissolving into streams of digital characters that flow into the quill. The background is a clean, minimalist workspace with subtle circuit board patterns. The repository name 'Image to Text OCR' is subtly etched onto the digital scroll. The overall mood is one of effortless transformation and digital magic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with soft, ethereal lighting and a vibrant color palette.

name: semantic-kernel
description: Integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps
readme_summary: Semantic Kernel is an enterprise-ready orchestration framework for integrating AI models into applications. It allows developers to build and deploy AI agents and multi-agent systems with flexibility and reliability, supporting various LLMs, plugins, and vector databases.
key_features: Model Flexibility (OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Hugging Face, NVidia, etc.)
Agent Framework (tools/plugins, memory, planning)
Multi-Agent Systems Orchestration
Plugin Ecosystem (native code, prompt templates, OpenAPI, MCP)
Vector DB Support (Azure AI Search, Elasticsearch, Chroma)
Multimodal Support (text, vision, audio)
Local Deployment Options (Ollama, LMStudio, ONNX)
Process Framework for complex business processes
Enterprise Ready (observability, security, stable APIs)
primary_use_case: Building and orchestrating AI agents and multi-agent systems within applications.
cover_image_prompt: A master architect, representing Semantic Kernel, standing at a holographic blueprint table. The blueprint displays intricate connections between various AI 'building blocks' (icons for LLMs, memory, tools). The architect is gesturing, seamlessly integrating these blocks to construct a complex, glowing AI agent. Small, stylized data streams flow from the blocks to the agent, representing input and output. The scene is a futuristic, clean workspace with subtle code snippets and data visualizations integrated into the environment. The overall mood is one of intelligent creation and sophisticated integration. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style, emphasizing clarity and the interconnectedness of AI components.

name: appwrite
readme_summary: Appwrite is a developer-first, open-source backend-as-a-service platform that simplifies building scalable web, mobile, and backend applications. It provides a suite of microservices packaged as Docker containers, offering features like authentication, databases, storage, and cloud functions, along with an integrated hosting solution.
key_features: End-to-end platform for Web, Mobile, Native, or Backend apps
Packaged as a set of Docker microservices
Includes backend server and integrated hosting solution
User authentication with multiple sign-in methods
Database for storing and querying data
Storage and file management
Image manipulation
Cloud Functions
Messaging services
primary_use_case: To abstract the complexity of building modern applications, enabling developers to create secure, full-stack applications faster by providing a comprehensive set of backend services.
cover_image_prompt: A master builder architect, standing in a vibrant, organized workshop filled with neatly arranged digital blueprints and tools. They are effortlessly assembling a complex, futuristic city skyline using glowing, interlocking blocks that represent different Appwrite services (like authentication, database, storage). Small, stylized icons of various devices (phone, laptop, server) are connected to the city by glowing data streams. The Appwrite logo is subtly integrated into the architect's tool belt. The scene is bright, optimistic, and rendered in a clean, 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clarity and interconnectedness.

name: puter
description: üåê The Internet Computer! Free, Open-Source, and Self-Hostable.
readme_summary: Puter is an open-source, self-hostable internet operating system that functions as a personal cloud computer. It allows users to store files, run applications, and access their data from anywhere, offering an alternative to traditional cloud storage and remote desktop solutions.
key_features: Privacy-first personal cloud
Platform for building and publishing websites/apps/games
Alternative to Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive
Remote desktop environment
Extensible and developer-friendly
primary_use_case: To provide a self-hostable, privacy-focused personal cloud operating system accessible from anywhere.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, modern personal computer screen displaying a vibrant, organized digital desktop environment. From this central screen, various digital streams flow outwards like roots or branches, connecting to different cloud icons (representing files, apps, games) and remote devices (laptops, tablets). A subtle, glowing 'Puter' logo is integrated into the main screen's interface. The overall scene should evoke a sense of seamless connectivity, accessibility, and personal control over digital assets, using a clean, 3D isometric illustration style with a bright, optimistic color palette.
